TextBlock.Text: How can we gain the materials needed for the SSPU?
Solution 1: Harvest the asteroids in the rings of Bruised Brother.
TULIP: This seems the best course of action. The ring system is large enough to not cause conciderable maneuvers to objects that call Bruised Brother their orbital parent.
FERN: The stone making up this asteroid and its peers is highly unstable. I doubt long-term stability for the hardware would be an option with this.
BASIL: No, No, and No. If we do, it's nearly certain the diverse ecosystem(s) of Familliar Refuse would collapse. It may be durable, but it sure is.. horrible.
